title: Call Of The Wild With Marian Call
description: Marian Call is an Alaskan chanteuse who found an audience after winning a Firefly-related song contest in 2007. She has run her music career as an independent grassroots effort ever since. She connects with her fans constantly and directly, both through social media and crowdfunding, and sleeping on their floors during tours and house concerts. She spends a lot of time on the road, and we talked in person (appropriately enough, in my living room) right after GeekGirlCon 2013 in Seattle in October. She lives on Twitter @mariancall and is currently on tour in Europe.
itunes:author: Glenn Fleishman
itunes:subtitle: Marian Call is an Alaskan chanteuse with a loyal following who independently manages her music and her tours.
